Privacy Policy

×

Information Collection and Use

CyberXYZ collects and processes your personal information to:

  • Provide cybersecurity services and support
  • Respond to security incidents and threats
  • Send critical security updates and alerts
  • Maintain and improve our security services

Data Protection

We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your data:

  • End-to-end encryption for all sensitive data
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Strict access controls and authentication
  • 24/7 security monitoring and threat detection

Information Sharing

We may share your information with:

  • Our authorized security partners and service providers
  • Law enforcement when required by law
  • Emergency response teams during security incidents

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Request data correction or deletion
  • Opt-out of marketing communications
  • Request data portability

Contact Us

For any privacy-related concerns, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@cyberxyz.com
